ns4:message.ns4:content: "SQUAD LEADER: Listen up to our OPORD...."
js moveTo(5,16); moveTo(6,17); moveTo(7,18); moveTo(8,19); moveTo(9,15);

SQUAD LEADER: 'Okay, assigned battle buddy teams and sectors. Alpha Team Leader and Alpha SAW, 12 to 9 O'clock position. Alpha Grenadier and Rifleman, 12 to 3 O'clock position. Bravo Team Leader and Bravo AW, 9 to 6 O'clock position, and Bravo Grenadier and Rifleman, 6 to 3 O'clock position.'

SQUAD LEADER: 'Threat level (amber). Weapon at low ready and safe. Only engage local population (non-combatants) and civilian infrastructure if personal safety is in danger, return fire only when fired upon. Positive identification or PID must be confirmed before engaging hostile forces.'
SQUAD LEADER: 'Prepare to copy, operations order. Establish squad file formation.'
SQUAD LEADER: 'HEY KNUCKLEHEAD, you're flagging friendlies... pay attention!'
